snippet.title: Rise Against the Invaders Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Rise Against the Invaders
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1388170/Rise_Against_the_Invaders

BUILD | DEFEND | SURVIVE
An alien invasion city builder.

An alien menace has ravaged Earth. Humanity has scattered to the wind. But hope remains. A resistance is organizing. Build your new settlement, defend your people, and fight to reclaim what was lost.

Coming Early 2021.

Developed by BASEMENTMODE
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/basementmode
DISCORD: https://discord.gg/PsdyUY5
WEBSITE: https://www.invadersgame.com/

#citybuilder #survival #basebuilding #aliens #UE4 #videogames #indiegames #indiedev
